entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except southeast 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
